name: serviceprovider
description:
The ServiceProvider or DBC Open Platform is the API for the danish public libraries.

The ServiceProvider provides access to DBCs services. The purpose is to make a unified, easy-to-use way to access the different bibliographic APIs. The serviceprovider works as a gateway to other services, and does not include the actual search/database/etc. logic.

scripts.prettier: prettier --no-bracket-spacing --single-quote --write src/*.js src/*/*.js src/*/*/*.js src/*/*/*/*.js client/dbc_openplatform.js
scripts.start:sp: SMAUG=http://localhost:3333 SWAGGER_HTTP=true TEST_DEV=true forever -w --watchDirectory src/ --killSignal=SIGTERM src/main.js
scripts.start:sp-prod: SMAUG=https://auth-config.dbc.dk SWAGGER_HTTP=true TEST_DEV=true forever -w --watchDirectory src/ --killSignal=SIGTERM src/main.js
scripts.swagger:validate: curl localhost:8080/v3/swagger.json > swagger.json ; npx swagger validate swagger.json
scripts.test: SMAUG=http://localhost:3333 LOG_LEVEL=info npx mocha --timeout 15000 --require babel-core/register --recursive src/**/__tests__/* src/__tests__/* src/transformers/utils/**/__tests__/* src/transformers/aggregations/__tests__/* --exit
scripts.watch-test: SMAUG=http://localhost:3333 LOG_LEVEL=info npx mocha --watch --timeout 15000 --require babel-core/register --recursive src/**/__tests__/* src/__tests__/* src/transformers/utils/**/__tests__/* src/transformers/aggregations/__tests__/*
scripts.coverage: SMAUG=http://localhost:3333 LOG_LEVEL=off babel-istanbul cover _mocha --report json --report lcov --dir ./coverage/units -- --recursive src/**/__tests__/* src/__tests__/* src/transformers/utils/**/__tests__/*
